name: Easy Digital Downloads – Checkout Notes
author: Astoundify

sections.description:
Add a textarea to the checkout form where customers can leave notes about their order.

Where can I use this?

While this extension will work with any Easy Digital Download installation, we made it specifically to go alongside our Crowdfunding plugin, as it supports adding the collected data to our custom exports. We currently have two compatible themes that have been released:

  • The first theme released is called “Fundify” from Astoundify A large community crowdfunding theme, like Kickstarter or Indiegogo.
  • The second theme released is called “Campaignify” from Astoundify A multi-purpose crowdfunding theme, great for single project crowdfunding.
sections.installation:
1. Install and Activate
  2. Visit “Campaigns > Settings > Extensions” to configure the labels.
